title: Landscape Architecture Alumni Scholarship Fund
description: To provide scholarship support for incoming and enrolled students in the Landscape Architecture Program at the University of Colorado Denver. If $25,000 is raised within five years (2023), the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
marketingContent: To provide scholarship support for incoming and enrolled students in the Landscape Architecture Program at the University of Colorado Denver. If $25,000 is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a pure endowment.
